description: Schema for a build package file

languages.description: The set of language runtimes needed by Fuchsia packages in this file

imports.description: A list of paths to other build package files to include

labels.description: A list of GN labels to build; useful for e.g. host tools

packages.description: A map of Fuchsia packages; each entry's key must match exactly the name of the package in the entry's value

resources.description: A list of files to add to the final image

language.description: A language runtime available on Fuchsia

resource.description: A file to add to the final system image

bootfs_path.description: Path of the file on the target

file.description: Location of the file relative to the root of the Fuchsia tree
